posts.postText: My name is Dick Nixon. I enjoy long walks on the beach under a moonlit starry sky. On Wednesdays I go shopping, and have buttered scones for tea. I'm the annoying guy who stands at stoplights all day in the city to try to sell you a half-dead boquet of flowers. I hate every single last one of you [except Bird and especially Ben], but not as much as I hate  Canadians  [that means you Mak]. Smoking cigarrettes is bad for your lungs, and that's why I only smoke crack. It only makes you lose your teeth, which are easily replaceable many times over. I are floodmin; hear me roar [insert roar here]. I am an asshole atheist, so go to Hell [get it?]. Blahblah blah typing why are you wasting your time reading this? I like to invent new words for no reason [Pluptent]. I collect L.L. Bean Backpacks as well as the plastic bags inside of cereal boxes. I am a college student majoring in the fine art of dicking around. In the summer I will enroll in a program that will give me the oppurtunity to spend my precious time dicking around in other countries.  I like to drink Arnold Palmers because the old man on the can reminds me of when I used to sleep with Bearcats'' dad when I was little. Now you can turn off your computer knowing that your life is complete because you know a little more about Dick [yes that's a pun]. That is all.

olol

My name is Dick Nixon. I enjoy long walks on the beach under a moonlit starry sky. On Wednesdays I go shopping, and have buttered scones for tea. I'm the annoying guy who stands at stoplights all day in the city to try to sell you a half-dead boquet of flowers. I hate every single last one of you [except Bird and especially Ben], but not as much as I hate Canadians [that means you Mak]. Smoking cigarrettes is bad for your lungs, and that's why I only smoke crack. It only makes you lose your teeth, which are easily replaceable many times over. I are floodmin; hear me roar [insert roar here]. I am an asshole atheist, so go to Hell [get it?]. Blahblah blah typing why are you wasting your time reading this? I like to invent new words for no reason [Pluptent]. I collect L.L. Bean Backpacks as well as the plastic bags inside of cereal boxes. I am a college student majoring in the fine art of dicking around. In the summer I will enroll in a program that will give me the oppurtunity to spend my precious time dicking around in other countries. I like to drink Arnold Palmers because the old man on the can reminds me of when I used to sleep with Bearcats'' dad when I was little. Now you can turn off your computer knowing that your life is complete because you know a little more about Dick [yes that's a pun]. That is all.
